title: RustDesk Client for Windows Transfer File Link Following Information Disclosure Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows local attackers to disclose sensitive information on affected installations of RustDesk Client for Windows. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the Transfer File feature. By uploading a symbolic link, an attacker can abuse the service to read arbitrary files. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to disclose information in the context of SYSTEM.
addtionnal_details: RustDesk has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://github.com/rustdesk/rustdesk/pull/13736
timeline:
2025-09-11 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2026-02-19 - Coordinated public release of advisory
2026-02-19 - Advisory Updated
